column4: Hi, I'm searching for a Howto to enable Routing between two _private_ subnets. I don't want to masquerade
Does anyone knows how to enable routing between to subnets without masquerading?
If they use different IP's, there's no problem in enabling routing.
do one box have both networks connected, or are there routers in between?
One box have both networks connected (wlan and eth)
Thing is.  Say you have eth0:192.168.0.1, and eth1:10.0.0.1
rochfordo: I just want to have a connection between this subnets, no internet, nothing else ;-)
uh, that may be the problem: the way back
The important thing is that you got things up and running :D
my girlfriend has a 54mbit card........i thing that i just take her pc to view....
